attributes.action: Time for the King of this country to dissolve government
attributes.additional_details: It is now time for the King to step in and dissolve Government due to a no trust and dirty tactics they are using to block democracy. Government are asking again to stop next elections in May 2026. This is stopping tax and council tax electorates fro making their choices at the polling stations. The public need the right to vote, not be blocked from a vote
attributes.background: Government does not seem to be listening to the public, the people who voted them in. Even those who voted, are regretting their votes. If Labour isn’t listening to the public, making their own rules to stop other parties from a chance, then it’s time for the King to step in and dissolve Government

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  

Call an Immediate General Election https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
